description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has abused misconfigured AD CS certificate templates to impersonate admin users and create additional authentication certificates.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Trello)

external_references.description: Wolfram, J. et al. (2022, April 28). Trello From the Other Side: Tracking APT29 Phishing Campaigns. Retrieved August 3, 2022.
